content.raw:
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} is it OK, that `subt_solution_latest` on [https://hub.docker.com/r/osrf/subt-virtual-testbed/tags](https://hub.docker.com/r/osrf/subt-virtual-testbed/tags) is 2 months old? Our image is based on this example solution, so I am just checking. Also can you please confirm that for you the unittest works locally fine?

p.s. I am going to comment out subscription of `/clock` topic and check it on AWS as unittest2
content.html:
@Alfredo Bencomo is it OK, that subt_solution_latest on https://hub.docker.com/r/osrf/subt-virtual-testbed/tags is 2 months old? Our image is based on this example solution, so I am just checking. Also can you please confirm that for you the unittest works locally fine?

p.s. I am going to comment out subscription of /clock topic and check it on AWS as unittest2
